summary: The client approved the execution of Sprint SP-001, which was initiated by Sarah, queuing stories US-010, US-001, and US-015 for processing with an estimated duration of 20 minutes.

decisions.title: Execute Sprint SP-001
decisions.details: Client confirmed execution, starting the sprint with queued stories US-010, US-001, and US-015.

actions.task: Monitor and provide updates on sprint execution progress
